seo_en: Pentaho, authentication bypass, command execution, CVE-2021-31602
summary: 检测Pentaho Business Analytics是否存在认证绕过与命令执行漏洞（CVE-2021-31602），通过发送特定请求判断系统是否受影响
summary_en: Detect whether Pentaho Business Analytics has the authentication bypass and command execution vulnerability (CVE-2021-31602) by sending specific requests to determine if the system is affected
